summary: Provides a Django middleware component that processes HTTP conditional GET headers, compares request validators (If-None-Match, If-Modified-Since) with response validators (ETag, Last-Modified), and replaces the response with a 304 Not Modified when they match, while ensuring appropriate caching headers are set.
business_intent: Improve web performance and reduce unnecessary data transfer by enabling efficient client-side caching through proper handling of conditional GET requests.
